Lore

Cosmology and Creation Notes

  • Prim as foundational all/nothing magical source
  • The Turtle and sibling entities tied to world formation
  • Old Star, Old Mother, Lilith, and dragon-line implications

Artifact Lore

  • The Bends of Maerlyn's Rainbow as high-tier relic set
  • Red Bend appears displaced from expected stewardship

Current State

  • Time/space instability and wasteland progression are recurring concerns
  • Forbidden industrial magic is linked to ecological and arcane disasters
